nodes.text: Palawa was a planet in the Core Worlds. It was the planet of origin of two mystic Force traditions, the Followers of Palawa and the Chatos Academy.
Palawa joined the Galactic Republic early in its history, sometime between 25,000 BBY and 22,000 BBY.

This planet was the original homeworld of the Followers of Palawa. The planet was destroyed in a battle that had involved the Jedi Order, and the Jedi arranged for the relocation of the planet's inhabitants to Bunduki.
